text:
Yes I do! If I work for a big studio I would like to be an environment artist. However if I work for a smaller studio, I would probably want something more like look development (modeling, texturing, lighting, comping). 

My website is <http://stephaniemaccarthy.com|stephaniemaccarthy.com> and you can check out my 3D artwork and reel! I would love the feedback!
